In England, in the seven days to 18 August, there were 183,325 new confirmed cases (324.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 August, there were 173,568 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (9,757 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 August is 5,684,645 (10,052.4 cases per 100,000 population).
